minecraft:written_book_content.title: The Warden
minecraft:written_book_content.author: Minecraft
pages: {"text":"The Ancient Cities were once guarded by great wardens, powerful protectors of the cities and their mysterious portals and long-forgotten structures. These heavily-armoured defenders were almost undefeatable, but were soon doomed to fall. In the tragic events that"}
{"text":"transpired since, a new Warden would rise to defend these lands, and the cities would begin to fadeâ€¦"}
